companies.name: HavocAI
companies.reason: HavocAI has raised $85 million to expand its autonomous marine systems, targeting military applications, and has garnered attention for its innovative technology in unmanned surface vessels.

companies.name: xAI
companies.reason: Founded by Elon Musk, xAI is leveraging artificial intelligence to improve human scientific discovery and recently launched its Grokipedia project, aiming to compete with traditional informational platforms.

companies.name: CapStack
companies.reason: CapStack has raised $6 million to create a bank-to-bank marketplace aimed at de-risking portfolios and enhancing cooperation between banks, marking it as a pivotal player in the fintech landscape.
